game.name: Lost Zone: Survival
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, LAN PvP, 협동, LAN 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lost Zone: Survival ,Survive in a vast open world by battling harsh conditions, hunger, and unknown threats. Explore with friends, gather resources, fish, farm, and craft tools to stay alive. Beware of other players who can steal your hard-earned loot. Only the strongest will survive!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lost Zone: Survival ,Survive in a vast open world by battling harsh conditions, hunger, and unknown threats. Explore with friends, gather resources, fish, farm, and craft tools to stay alive. Beware of other players who can steal your hard-earned loot. Only the strongest will survive!
